description_top: Hebrew Bible: Pentateuch (Numbers-Deuteronomy) with Onḳelos and Hafṭarot
title: Hebrew Bible: Pentateuch (Numbers-Deuteronomy) with Onḳelos and Hafṭarot
description: Numbers starts from 4:44. Onḳelos after each verse. Hafṭarot written on the margins by two different hands: the first hand up to folio 36v, the second from folio 37r.
